EESAVE.description: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

512W_7E00.description: Boot Flash size=512 words Boot address=$7E00

1024W_7C00.description: Boot Flash size=1024 words Boot address=$7C00

2048W_7800.description: Boot Flash size=2048 words Boot address=$7800

4096W_7000.description: Boot Flash size=4096 words Boot address=$7000

LPM_SPM_DISABLE.description: LPM and SPM prohibited in Application Section

NO_LOCK.description: No lock on SPM and LPM in Application Section

LPM_SPM_DISABLE.description: LPM and SPM prohibited in Boot Section

NO_LOCK.description: No lock on SPM and LPM in Boot Section

ERASE_AND_WRITE_IN_ONE_OPERATION.description: Erase and Write in one operation

ICIE1.description: Timer/Counter n Input Capture Interrupt Enable

OCIE1B.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare B Interrupt Enable

OCIE1A.description: Timer/Counter1 Output Compare A Interrupt Enable

ICIE0.description: Timer/Counter n Input Capture Interrupt Enable

OCIE0B.description: Timer/Counter0 Output Compare B Interrupt Enable

OCIE0A.description: Timer/Counter0 Output Compare A Interrupt Enable

SPMCSR.description: Store Program Memory Control and Status Register

ADSCSRA.description: ADC Synchronization Control and Status Register

ADSCSRB.description: ADC Synchronization Control and Status Register

CADRCL.description: CC-ADC Regulator Current Comparator Threshold Level

SLOW_RC_OSCILLATOR_AS_SAMPLING_CLOCK.description: Slow RC Oscillator as sampling clock

COMPARATOR_ENABLED_REGULAR_CURRENT_COUNT.description: Comparator Enabled. Regular Current Counter counts up if Accumulated Current is above threshold and is reset if Accumulated Current is below threshold.
Comparator Enabled. Regular Current Counter counts up if Accumulated Current is above threshold and down if Accumulated Current is below threshold.

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_PI_PIN_ENABLED.description: Current source on PI pin enabled

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_NI_PIN_ENABLED.description: Current source on NI pin enabled

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_BOTH_PI_NI_PINS_ENABLE.description: Current source on both PI/NI pins enabled

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_PV_PIN_ENABLED.description: Current source on PV pin enabled

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_NV_PIN_ENABLED.description: Current source on NV pin enabled

CURRENT_SOURCE_ON_BOTH_PV_NV_PINS_ENABLE.description: Current source on both PV/NV pins enabled

BGCSRA.description: Bandgap Control and Status Register A

LID.description: Identifier bit 5 or Data Length bits

LAINC.description: Auto Increment of Data Buffer Index (Active Low)

LINDX.description: FIFO LIN Data Buffer Index bits

PA1DID.description: When this bit is written logic one, the digital input buffer of the corresponding V_ADC pin is disabled.

PA0DID.description: When this bit is written logic one, the digital input buffer of the corresponding V_ADC pin is disabled.

WUTCSR.description: Wake-up Timer Control and Status Register

RESET.description: External Pin, Power-on Reset, Brown-out Reset and Watchdog Reset
